item.title: Nickie add a quote by Thomas Jefferson
item.description: "If a nation expects to be ignorant and free, in a state of civilization, it expects what never was and never will be." -- Thomas Jefferson

item.title: Nickie add a quote by Thomas Jefferson
item.description: "I predict future happiness for Americans, if they can prevent the government from wasting the labors of the people under the pretense of taking care of them." -- Thomas Jefferson

item.title: Nickie add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "True law is right reason in agreement with nature;...it summons to duty by its commands, and averts from wrongdoing by its prohibitions...It is a sin to try to alter this law, nor is it allowable to repeal any part of it, and it is impossible to abolish it entirely." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Nickie add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "God's law is 'right reason.' When perfectly understood it is called 'wisdom.' When applied by government in regulating human relations it is called 'justice." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero
